00037 #ifndef PLY_DATA_READER
00038 #define PLY_DATA_READER
00039 
00040 #include "omega/scene/MeshData.h"
00041 #include "omega/scene/ply.h"
00042 
00043 namespace omega 
00044 {
00045 namespace scene 
00046 {
00047     /*  Holds the flat data and offers routines to read, scale and sort it.  */
00048     class PlyDataReader: public MeshData
00049     {
00050     public:
00051         PlyDataReader();
00052 
00053         bool readPlyFile( const std::string& file );
00054         void sort( const uint start, const uint length, const Axis axis );
00055         void scale( const float baseSize = 2.0f );
00056         void calculateNormals( const bool vertexNormals = true );
00057         void calculateBoundingBox();
00058         const AlignedBox3& getBoundingBox() const { return _boundingBox; }
00059         Axis getLongestAxis( const size_t start, const size_t elements ) const;
00060 
00061         void useInvertedFaces() { _invertFaces = true; }
00062 
00063     private:
00064         void readVertices( PlyFile* file, const int nVertices, 
00065                            const bool readColors );
00066         void readTriangles( PlyFile* file, const int nFaces );
00067 
00068         AlignedBox3 _boundingBox;
00069         bool        _invertFaces;
00070     };
00071 }; // namespace scene
00072 } // namespace omega
00073 
00074 
00075 #endif // MESH_VERTEXDATA_H
